mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish (name, description, image, price, category_id, status, deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{image}, #{price}, #{categoryId}, #{status}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, category_id, name, price, image, description, status, stock, sales, deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM dish WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE dish SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, image = #{image}, price = #{price}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
